Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti of Shedkhons with a blue curled-lappet wig, a red face, a blue and yellow collar, red hands in low relief holding two red hoes, the body is painted white, the legs are decorated with a central column of black painted hieroglyphs on a yellow ground bordered by red lines, the back has a red and yellow seed-basket and two red vessels hanging down each arm.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
